item.description:
Bring-Your-Own-Fruit*, swimsuit, towel, and life-vest** to sunbathe, swim, canoe, pedal-boat, or sit with your feet in the Lake to cool off.

Please call to R.S.V.P. and get directions, public-transportation, and parking information. Thank you!

*ie: apple, avocado, banana, berry, cherry, coconut, cucumber, date, fig, grape, grapefruit, kiwi, lemon, mango, melon, olive, orange, peach, pear, pepper, persimmon, pineapple, tomato, zucchini, etc.

**Canoe, pedal-boat, and some life-vests provided. :) Swim/boat at own risk.
item.name: Fruit @ Lake
